channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Home Alone 2: Lost In New York
channel.desc: Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Family 1992 When Kevin is accidentally separated from his family once again, he finds himself alone in NYC, where he not only has to outsmart the same thieves from last time but also take on new challenges in the big city. Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara, Chris Columbus, John Hughes.
